PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryAnchorBolt
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to different types of anchor bolts.
PropertySetDef.ApplicableTypeValue: IfcDiscreteAccessory.ObjectType="Foundation bolt", "Ribbed bar bolt", "Extension bolt" | IfcDiscreteAccessoryType.ElementType="Foundation bolt", "Ribbed bar bolt", "Extension bolt"

PropertyDef.Name: AnchorBoltLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the anchor bolt.

PropertyDef.Name: AnchorBoltDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the anchor bolt bar(s).

PropertyDef.Name: AnchorBoltThreadLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the threaded part of the anchor bolt.

PropertyDef.Name: AnchorBoltProtrusionLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the protruding part of the anchor bolt.
